title: Effective drainage of rain water- The roof of a building shall be so constructed or framed as to permit effective drainage of the rain water there from by means of rain water pipes at the scale of at least one pipe of 10cm diameter for every 40-sq
clause_text: Effective drainage of rain water- The roof of a building shall be so constructed or framed as to permit effective drainage of the rain water there from by means of rain water pipes at the scale of at least one pipe of 10cm diameter for every 40-sq.m of roof area. Such pipes shall be so arranged, jointed and fixed as to ensure that the rain water is carried away efficiently.
